docs.lead_paragraph: KNOCKING AT EVERY MAN'S DOOR.--There is a great deal of cholera morbus about. Some attribute it to the cucumbers, some to the soft huckleberries, some to the excess of currants they eat. one family in Brooklyn, as they rolled about the foor "in a maritime agony." yesterday, laid their gripings to their hearty meal of cabbage and beet tops.

docs.snippet: Intelligence from the Windward Islands reaches us to the 11th ult. At Barbadoes, the House of Assembly had held one sitting, but no business of importance was transacted. The Colonial Secretary, Mr. WALKER, comes to England by this packet on a short...
docs.lead_paragraph: Intelligence from the Windward Islands reaches us to the 11th ult. At Barbadoes, the House of Assembly had held one sitting, but no business of importance was transacted. The Colonial Secretary, Mr. WALKER, comes to England by this packet on a short leave of absence, Mr. J. HAMPDEN KING acting as his locum tenens. The health of the island continued

headline.main: NEW - YORK CITY.; FARMERS' CLUB. Currant Culture, Gooseberries, Peas, Early Southern Frair, &c. Mayer's Office Board of Supervisors.

docs.abstract: Opinion of Busted in regard to their pay
docs.lead_paragraph: The Farmers' Club resumed its bi-monthly meetings on Monday, Mr PARDEE in the Chair. The Session was opened by Judge MEIGS reading extracts and translations from foreign agricultural journals. One from the Rerue Horticole announces that the leaves of plants do not-cannot absorb dew, their function being simply a respiratory one.

headline.main: Castleton Board of Health--Letter from Dr. Mundy.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: I wish to correct a misstatement which appeared in your issue of this date under the head of Quarantine Affairs, in relation to the action of the Board of Health of Castieton, Richmond County. There was no meeting of the Board yesterday, as stated, and therefore the Board could not have done what was represented,

docs.snippet: The United States Mail Steamship North Star, A. G. JONES, Esq., commander, having sailed from Havre on the 7th inst. and from Cowes the same evening, at 5 o' clock, arrived at Sandy Hook yesterday morning.

headline.main: EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE NORTH STAR. Failure of the Second Attempt to Lay the Atlantic Cable. RETURN OF THE FLEET TO IRELAND. Independence Day in London. INTERESTING FROM AUSTRALIA. Cotton and Breadstuffs Active----Money Market Improved.

headline.main: The Great Base Ball Match at the Fashion Course--Brooklyn Beaten.

docs.lead_paragraph: The match between the nine selected from the Knikerbocker, Gotham, Empire, Eagle, and Union Clubs on the part of the Heboken and New-York Clubs, and the nine selected from the Putnam, Excelsior, Atlantic, and Eckford Clubs, on the part of the Brooklyn Clubs, which was adjourned over from Tuesday, the 13th inst., on account of the rain, took place yesterday, on the Fashion Race Course, Long island. headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Coroner's Inquests. Mayor's Police Police Intelligence.

docs.lead_paragraph: BOARD OF PILOT COMMISSIONERS.--At a meeting of the Board of Pilot Commissioners, held at their office on the 20th inst., a letter was read from His Honor the Mayor, asking the cooperation of the Board in relation to the Quarantine Regulations and the Pilots.

docs.snippet: We regret to record the death of WILLIAM T. PORTER, which occurred yesterday morning at 9 1/2 o'clock, at his residence, No. 51 Bleecker-street. Thirty-two years ago Mr. PoRTER was foreman of a printing office in this City, and employed HORACE...
docs.lead_paragraph: We regret to record the death of WILLIAM T. PORTER, which occurred yesterday morning at 9 1/2 o'clock, at his residence, No. 51 Bleecker-street. Thirty-two years ago Mr. PoRTER was foreman of a printing office in this City, and employed HORACE GREELEY as a compositor.

headline.main: QUARANTINE AFFAIRS.; Bogus Case of Yellow Fever Outside the Wall--The Board of Health Discharge Dr. Munday--The Board Partition to be Abandoned--Case of the Grotto and the Susquehanna--Trouble About the Warehouse.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new element was developed at Stapleton, Staten Island, yesterday, by the rumor that the wife of a lighterman, living in the town had died of yellow fever. The authority for the rumor was the statement of the attending physician that the woman died of black vomit.

docs.snippet: The Pacific mail steamship Star of the West, Captain GRAY, will leave to-day for Aspinwall, with a full complement of passengers and the California mails. The effect of the Frazer River gold excitement is already beginning to be felt in the increase...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pacific mail steamship Star of the West, Captain GRAY, will leave to-day for Aspinwall, with a full complement of passengers and the California mails. The effect of the Frazer River gold excitement is already beginning to be felt in the increase of emigration to California; there was quite a number of Canadians among the crowd on board this steamer.
